title: PCA Guide
text:
Should be proficient in:

Enterprise cloud stategy
Solution design
Architectural best practices

Should be experienced in software development methodologies, including multi-tiered distributed applications that span multicloud or hybrid environments.
For more information, visit the Professional Cloud Architect certification page.

text:

Material icon 설치

주석의 사용법 / ** 누르고 Enter


타입스크립트의 장점이란?

에러에대한 사전방지
코드 가이드 및 자동완성 ( 개발 생산성 향상)



NPM 세팅

npm i typescript -g => not working
tsc app.ts => not working
npx tsc app.ts => working… why



바벨 사이트?

최대한 많은 브라우저에 호환 할 수 있게 문법을 바꾸어줌

- Your Own Data Center
- 자체 linux 운영체제 사용 



- OS 자유자재 사용
- Auto scaling and load balancing 사용가능
- CDN 사용가능
- 스스로... 관리
- scaling 정책 수립 필요



- os 커스텀 불가능



- kubernetes on gcp?
- 컨테이너화 되어있어야함
- cluster 스스로 관리?



- Event Based
- No ops and Serverless
- 서비리스
- latency가 없음... 



- Storage vs speed
- custom vs predefined



- 월마트나 까르푸 같은 것 
- 핵심은... Asia 로 서비스를 확장하는 것 



- 작은 덩어리로 나누기 어려움
- a-b test 하기 어려움
- dependency (종속성)이 너무 많음




Cloud Interconnect

Cloud VPN
Cloud Router




- 헬스케어
- 헬리콥터

title: GCP study with Cloudstorage, Containers
text:
Standard Storage
Nearline Storage
Coldline Storage
Archive Storage




Hot data
frequently access data





자주 엑세스 하지 않는 데이터
Once per month





자주 엑세스 하지 않는 데이터
Nearline Storage 와 비교할 때 읽기 또는 수정을 위한 것이다.





백업 및 재해복구 용
Once a year






완전히 관리되는 관계형 디비
수평으로 확장가능
고가용성 서비스에 적합
많은 수의 입출력 서비스에 적합
한마디로 말해 글로벌 서비스에 적합?





Flexible
Horizontally scalable
Nosql cloud db
Retrieve individual documents
Retrive all the documents in a collection
Can include multiple, chained filters
Can combine filtering and sorting options
Indexed by default






Google’s NoSQL Big data database service
Cloud Bigtable can interact with other Google Cloud services and third-parth clients





Which database service can scale to higher database size?

Cloud Spanner

You manufacture devices with sensors and need to stream huge amounts of data from these devices to a storage option in the cloud. Which storage option is the best choice for your application?

Bigtable

Your application needs to store data with strong transactional consistency, and you want seamless scaling up. Which storage option is the best choice for your application?

Cloud Spanner

title: GCP study with Cloudstorage, Containers
text:
Container

App Engine

Access to programming serices to write your code
Seamless, independent and rapid scaling
No fine-tuning the underlying architecture to save cost



Kubernetes

A Pod is a small unit



GKE

Google Cloud’s load-balancing for Compute Engine instances
Node pools to designate subsets of nodes within a cluster
Automatic scaling of your cluster’s node instance count
Automatic upgrades for your cluster’s node software
Node auto-repair to maintain node health and availability
Logging and monitoring with Google Cloud’s operations suite



Anthos

A hybrid and multi-cloud solution
Framework rests on Kubernetes and GKE On-Prem
Provides a rich set of tools for monitoring and maintenance



GCP

Virtual Machines
Networks
Storage
Containers



App Engine

App Engine is a fully managed, serverless platform for developing and hosting web applications at scale



Built-in services and APIs -> App Engine 이 제공하는 것들

NoSQL datastores
Health checks
MemcACHE
Application logging
Load balancing
User authentication API



Each SDK includes

APIs and libraries
Sandbox environment
Deployment tools


The SDK manages your applicaiton locally, and the Google Cloud Console manages your application in production

title: GCP study with Cloudstorage, Containers
text:
App Engine 환경

Flexible
Standard


Standard Environment (App Engine)

Persistent storage with queries, sorting, and transactions
Automatic scaling and load balancing
Asychronous task queues for performing work outside the scope of a request
Scheduled tasks for triggering events at specified times or regular intervals



Standard Environment (App Engine Korean version)

쿼리, 정렬 및 트랜잭션이 있는 영구적인 저장소
자동적인 스케일링과 로드밸런싱
범위에서 벗어난 비동기 작업요청을 수행할 수 있다.
특정한 시간이나 정규적인 시간간격으로 작업을 예약 할 수있다.



Standard Environment 2

Use specified versions of Java,Python, PHP, Go, Node.js, and Ruby
Application must conform(순응해야한다) to sandbox




참고그림




Flexible Environment

Microservices
Autorization
SQL & NoSQL databases
Traffic splitting
Logging
Search
Versioning

출처 : Coursera

Benefits from custom configurations and libraries, while focusing on writing code
Customize the runtime and operating system of your virtual machine.
Customize or provide runtimes by supplying a custom Docker image or Dockerfile




image-20221213103538004





image-20221213104554296





image-20221213132238246





image-20221213134607359





image-20221213142931939

Cloud Run
The managed compute platform that lets you run stateless containers through web requests or Pub/Sub events



image-20221213143212206





image-20221213153656428

Apigee Edge

Perform business analytics and billing on a customer-facing

App Engine

App Engine manages the hardware and networking infrastructure required to run your code
The daily biling for an App Engine application can drop to zero

Flexible 의 이점 (vs Standard)

You can use SSH to connect to the virtual machines on which your application runs
You can install third-party binaries

Cloud Functions

title: GCP study with me
text:
gcp-study and summarize


DB 정리하기

DB 의 종류가… 많아도 너무나 많다


Case study 정리하기

수많은…자료

★ 기출 분석 ★

---
title: GCP study with me
author: yeji
date: '2022-12-05'
categories:
  - study
  - gcp
format:
  html:
    code-fold: true
image: "gcp.png"
---

Terragrunt 에서 중요한 것들

main.tf (실제로 실행하는 파일)
variable.tf (입력값, name, 주소)
output.tf
data.tf



순서

dev main.tf
module main.tf
module var.tf
dev var.tf



output.tf

역할은 출력
출력하고 싶은것을 정할 수 가 잇다.
테라폼으로 만든 출력이 되는거를 가져온다.



data.tf

콘솔로 만든것도 가져온다. 테라폼으로 만든것만 가져오는 output.tf와 다르다
주로 filter를 사용해 원하는 것만 가져온다.



lookup

맵에서 키를 찾는 명령어



dynamic

딕셔너리 안에 딕셔너리가 있는 경우 사용
https://frozenpond.tistory.com/200

항상 공식문서를 확인 할 것
항상 확인 할 것 


contains

리스트 안에 원소가 있는지 없는지 여부

title: GCP study with me
text:
GCP

Application Services
Compute
Storage
Big Data
Machine Learning



Rate quota vs Allocation quota

Rate quota reset after specific time

You can change some quotas by requesting an increase from Google Cloud Support


Service Account

What if you want to give permissions to a Compute Engine virtual machine rather than to a person? 의 대한 답



GCP 와의 상호작용

Google Cloud console
Cloud SDK and Cloud Shell
APIs
Cloud Mobile App



IAM roles from general to specific(iam 역할을 일반적인것부터특별한 순으로 나열한다면)

Basic roles, predefined roles, custom roles.


IAM policies that are implemented by lower-level policies can override the policies defined at a higher level.



8.8.8.8

A public dns (domain name service) to the world



Carrier peering

Peering to your on premise network


Networks are global, and subnets are regional



Google cloud db ?

정형 (Structured data)
비정형(Unstructured data)
트랜잭션(Transferred data)
관계형 데이터 (Relational data)



Cloud Storage

내구성이 뛰어나고 가용성이 높은 오브젝트 스토리지
오브젝트로 관리하는 컴퓨터 데이터 스토리지 아키텍처



Object Storage 는 파일이나 폴더구조나 디스크가 아니다

Binary form of the actual data itself
Relevant associated meta-data
Globally unique identifier



Binary large-object (BLOB) storage

Online content
Backup and archiving
Storage of intermediate results



The Storage object offered by Cloud Storage are immutable

그래서 편집하지 않고 새버전이 계속 생겨진다.



Lifecycle polices

Delete objects older than 365 days
각 객체의 최신버전 3개만 유지합니다.



Standard Storage

Hot data
Only brief periods of time (단기간에 적합)



Nearline Storage

once per moth (자주 접근하지 않는 데이터)
data archiving, data backups, long-tail multimedia content
